cards.name: Will
cards.text: Stealth. Insight. Forced Reaction: After you lose an unopposed challenge, sacrifice a Ranger character you control.

cards.name: The Watch Has Need
cards.text: Action: Name a trait: Builder, Ranger, or Steward. Search the top X cards of your deck for any number of characters with that trait, reveal them, and add them to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck. X is your reserve value.

cards.name: Maester Luwin
cards.text:
While you control:
- Robb Stark, he gains insight.
- Jon Snow, he gains stealth.
- Bran Stark, he gains: "immune to opponents' plot effects."
- Rickon Stark, he gains pillage.

cards.name: Lady
cards.text: [stark] character only. Terminal. Attached character gets +2 STR. Action: Pay 1 gold to attach Lady to a different character. Then, if attached character is Sansa Stark, stand her. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Arbor Knight
cards.text: Challenges Action: Pay 1 gold to choose a participating House Redwyne character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +1 STR. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

cards.name: Pleasure Barge
cards.text: Immune to card effects. Reaction: After you marshal Pleasure Barge, if you have not yet drawn any cards this phase, draw 3 cards. -1 Income

cards.name: Renly Baratheon
cards.text: Reduce the cost of the first non-[baratheon] character you marshal each round by 1.

cards.name: King Robert's Warhammer
cards.text: Attached character gets +1 STR. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating as an attacker, choose and kneel up to X total STR worth of characters, where X is attached character's STR. Then, sacrifice King Robert's Warhammer.

cards.name: The Hound
cards.text: Ambush (4). Forced Reaction: After you win a challenge in which The Hound is participating, you may discard 1 card at random from your hand. If you do not, return The Hound to your hand.

cards.name: Cersei's Wheelhouse
cards.text: Reaction: After you become the first player, either: gain 1 gold, or draw 1 card. -1 Initiative

cards.name: The Seastone Chair
cards.text: Interrupt: When claim is applied for an unopposed [military] challenge in which you are the attacking player, kneel your faction card to choose a character without attachments, controlled by the losing opponent. Instead of the normal claim effects, kill that character.

cards.name: Rise of the Kraken
cards.text: Interrupt: When you gain power for winning an unopposed challenge, gain 2 power instead.

cards.name: Merchant Prince
cards.text: While Merchant Prince has an attachment, he gets +1 STR and gains a [military] icon.

cards.name: Vaes Dothrak
cards.text: Reaction: After you reveal a plot card, discard an attachment from your hand to choose an attachment with equal or lower printed cost, and discard it from play.

cards.name: Bastard Daughter
cards.text: Interrupt: When Bastard Daughter or The Red Viper is killed, discard 1 card at random from each opponent's hand.

cards.name: The Long Plan
cards.text: You do not return unspent gold to the treasury during the taxation phase. Reaction: After you lose a challenge, gain 1 gold.

cards.name: Support of the People
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge by 5 or more STR, search your deck for a location with printed cost 3 or lower, and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Street of the Sisters
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel your faction card to gain 1 power for your faction.

cards.name: Muster the Realm
cards.text: During a challenge in which you control an attacking Army character, raise the claim value on Muster the Realm by 1.

cards.name: Here to Serve
cards.text: When Revealed: Search your deck for a Maester character with printed cost 3 or lower, and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
